QuestData.Title: The Pit of Saron
QuestData.Description: Quickly, through the portal! I'll meet you on the other side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lady Jaina Proudmoore just inside the Pit of Saron.
QuestData.RewardText: I underestimated this Scourgelord, and it's my men that paid for it. When I think that my guilt over Arthas' betrayal cannot go any deeper, he proves me wrong yet again.$B$BWe have to press on. We cannot let their sacrifice be meaningless.
